page.title: 17 TRANSPORT IN KENNINGTON
page.content: There are many bus services in Kennington. All of them run through to Ashford. After a survey we conducted on first year classes of the Towers, we came to a decision that the bus service is not very popular: the fare is not reasonable, the buses are dirty, but on the contrary to this it is quite reliable and the drivers are polite at times. The buses come every hour. The numbers are as follows: 503 Towers View 505 William Harvey Hospital, 666 Tritton Fields, 666 Faversham, 400 Canterbury. These buses vary from single and double deckers. The bus station is in Station Road, Ashford. Every bus comes hourly from 7 am to 7pm. No buses run on a Sunday. There are also taxi services which run to Kennington. The two taxi services which cover Kennington are Arrow & Star. Most families own & use a car.
